title: Rajputana Grandeur: Diamond, Emerald & Sapphire Nakshi Haaram
materials: Natural Sapphires(Ceylon). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting lustre.
features: Intricate Nakshi work forming floral and paisley motifs. Statement Pendant with cascading Sapphire droplets. The diamond setting enhances the brilliance of each stone. Traditional South Indian design with a modern touch through the color combination.
occasions: Bridal Shower and high-end social gatherings. Suitable for both traditional and modern outfits.
description: A timeless masterpiece showcasing the artistry of Hyderabad's finest craftsmen. The exquisite blend of traditional Nakshi work with vibrant gemstones makes this Haaram a treasured heirloom. The combination of Diamonds, Emeralds and Sapphires symbolizes prosperity, love and wisdom. An investment piece with lasting value.
